detaileddescription.para: Mikhail Lozhnikov This file contains a series of functions for translating points to addresses and back and functions for comparing addresses.

The notion of addresses is described in the following paper. @inproceedings{bayer1997, author={Bayer,Rudolf}, title={TheUniversalB-TreeforMultidimensionalIndexing:General Concepts}, booktitle={ProceedingsoftheInternationalConferenceonWorldwide ComputingandItsApplications}, series={WWCA'97}, year={1997}, isbn={3-540-63343-X}, pages={198--209}, numpages={12}, publisher={Springer-Verlag}, address={London,UK,UK}, }
